name: Planetoid Defense
description:
Planetoid Defense is a space themed tower defense game with an innovative twist. Your mission is to defend your central planet from the onslaught of space! Build turrets to fend off asteroids, comets, The Planetoid, and more. Threats come from all sides, so build defenses to have all land covered. Tons of customization exists, with textures, colors, and races, with each race having its own separate benefits.
Features
  • 10 unique turrets!
  • Asteroids, Comets, The Planetoid, and more!
  • Endless waves; survive as long as possible!
  • 5 different races to choose from!
  • 4 different planet textures and over 50 colors!
  • Local score list, compete against your friends!
  • 40 different achievements!
  • Statistic tracking!
  • Interactive tutorial!
